feed.title: 黑客新闻摘要; ;https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml; ;2024-02-09T19:57:43.900848Z; ; ; <作者>; <名称>;polyrabbit; ;https://github.com/polyrabbit/; ; ;Werkzeug; ; ;向 LaTeX 文档添加咖啡渍（2021）</stitle>; <id>;https://ctan.org/pkg/coffeestains</id>; <更新>;2024-02-09T16 ：57：11.171331Z </更新>; <link href="https://ctan.org/pkg/coffeestains"/>; <作者>; <名称>;todsacerdoti </名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator。 com/user?id=todsacerdoti</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;这个包提供了 LaTeX 长期以来缺失的一项基本功能：它会在文档中添加咖啡渍。通过直接在页面上打印污点而不是手动添加污点可以节省大量时间。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#add-coffee-stains-to-latex-documents-2021" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https: //news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39316193" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat. io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;13 年后用 Go 编写 HTTP 服务（Mat Ryer，2024）</stitle>; <id>;https://grafana.com/blog/2024/02/ 09/how-i-write-http-services-in-go-after-13-years/</id>; <更新>;2024-02-09T19:03:11.173203Z</更新>; <link href="https: //grafana.com/blog/2024/02/09/how-i-write-http-services-in-go-after-13-years/"/>; <author>; <name>;matryer</name>; <uri >;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=matryer</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://grafana.com/media/blog/http -services-go/httpingo_2.png" style="宽度：220px；高度：116px；" />;<br />;本文讨论了作者在多年经验和社区讨论的影响下，用 Go 编写 HTTP 服务的更新方法。它涵盖了处理依赖项、中间件功能、初始化工作和测试的实践，旨在为在 Go 中编写高效、可维护和可测试的 HTTP 服务提供指导。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#writing-http-services-in-go-after-13-years-mat-ryer-2024" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a >; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39318867" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base=" https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;数据密集型应用程序的数据结构 [pdf]</stitle>; <id>;https://cs-people.bu。 edu/mathan/publications/fnt23-athanassoulis.pdf</id>; <更新>;2024-02-09T18:57:11.173703Z</更新>; <link href="https://cs-people.bu.edu/mathan /publications/fnt23-athanassoulis.pdf"/>; <作者>; <名称>;mfiguiere</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=mfiguiere</uri>; </author>; <内容type="html">;本文讨论了数据驱动系统中键值数据结构的重要性，概述了如何根据工作负载和硬件设计它们以实现最佳性能。它还强调了对适应工作负载的自适应数据结构的需求，以及不断发展的硬件对数据结构设计的影响。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#data-structs-for-data-intense-applications-pdf" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https: //news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39318774" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat. io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Hyperbridge：Rust 中的快速多生产者、多消费者无界通道</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/singaraiona/hyperbridge</id >; <更新>;2024-02-09T18:57:11.174202Z</更新>; <link href="https://github.com/singaraiona/hyperbridge"/>; <作者>; <name>;tosh</name>; <uri >;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=tosh</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://opengraph.githubassets.com/2ae10eb4e36ca7dc10544361e66fa9ffcb50bfa02c3a6a6ec84bb91999c24845/singaraiona /hyperbridge" style="宽度：220px；高度：110px；" />;<br />;本文描述了使用 Rust 中的 Hyperbridge 通道进行多线程操作，其中 10 个线程，每个线程向共享通道发送 10,000 个值。在后续示例中，它使用 16 个线程和一个原子计数器来执行类似的操作。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#hyperbridge-fast-multi- Producer-multi-consumer-unbounded-channel-in-rust" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; < a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39318305" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https: //hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;排列城市 (1994)</stitle>; <id>;https://www.gregegan.net/PERMUTATION/Permutation.html</ id>; <更新>;2024-02-09T11:57:11.174712Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.gregegan.net/PERMUTATION/Permutation.html"/>; <作者>; <名称>;RafelMri< /name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=RafelMri</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;排列城市”是关于创建软件的 Paul Durham 的叙述模拟自己进行有关人工智能、时间和因果关系的实验。尽管存在计算挑战，他还是聘请了 Autoverse 迷 Maria Deluca，为 Autoverse 内的虚拟生物圈设计种子。<a href="https://hackernews .betacat.io/#permutation-city-1994" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39313696" target="_blank ">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Reddit 击败电影再次行业，不必泄露盗版者的 IP 地址</stitle>; <id>;https://arstechnica.com/tech-policy/2024/02/reddit-beats-film-industry-again-wont-have- to-reveal-pirates-ip-addresses/</id>; <更新>;2024-02-09T19:24:11.175180Z</更新>; <link href="https://arstechnica.com/tech-policy/2024/ 02/reddit-beats-film-industry-again-wont-have-to-reveal-pirates-ip-addresses/"/>; <author>; <name>;coloneltcb</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator .com/user?id=coloneltcb</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://cdn.arstechnica.net/wp-content/uploads/2023/03/getty -reddit-800x533.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 147px;" />;<br />;电影公司第三次揭露 Reddit 用户讨论盗版的行为被美国法院阻止，以维护用户的隐私。法院裁定用户的 IP 地址受到第一修正案的审查。< a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#reddit-beats-film-industry-again-won-t-have-to-reveal-pirates-ip-addresses" target="_blank">;[摘要] </a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39319202" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml: base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;美国九个州正在联手加速热泵的采用</stitle>; <id>;https:// www.wired.com/story/这些-states-are-basically-begging-you-to-get-a-heat-pump/</id>; <更新>;2024-02-09T15:57:11.175694Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.wired.com/story/se-states-are-basically-begging-you-to-get-a-heat-pump/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;LinuxBender </name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=LinuxBender</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://media.wired .com/photos/65c2a5e2e97c1bcf47faf2f1/master/w_2560%2Cc_limit/Heat-Pump-Law-Science-1402870992.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 147px;" />;<br />;美国九个州正在加速从燃气供暖向电供暖的转变，目标是到 2030 年使热泵占住宅供暖出货量的至少 65%，到 2040 年达到 90%。这些州将寻求联邦资金，制定推出标准，并制定全面的计划来支持住宅建筑的广泛电气化。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#nine-us-states-are-teaming -up-to-accelerate-the-adoption-of-heat-pumps" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39315545 " target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text ">;Go 中的上下文控制</stitle>; <id>;https://zenhorace.dev/blog/context-control-go/</id>; <更新>;2024-02-09T12:57:11.177703Z</更新>; <link href="https://zenhorace.dev/blog/context-control-go/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;todsacerdoti</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user? id=todsacerdoti</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://zenhorace.dev/img/context-go.png" style="width: 220px; height: 111px;" />;<br />;本文强调了在 Go 中处理上下文管道的三个关键规则：只有入口点函数才应该创建新的上下文，上下文应该只沿着调用链传递，并且上下文不应该被存储或在函数返回后使用。它还强调了不要将 Context 存储在结构类型中的重要性，而是将 Context 显式传递给需要它的每个函数。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/# context-control-in-go" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39299715" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;瞻博网络支持门户公开了客户设备信息</stitle>; <id>;https://krebsonsecurity.com/2024/02/juniper-support-portal-expose-customer-device-info/</id>; <更新>;2024-02-09T15:57:11.178686Z </更新>; <link href="https://krebsonsecurity.com/2024/02/juniper-support-portal-expose-customer-device-info/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;todsacerdoti </名称>; < uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=todsacerdoti</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://krebsonsecurity.com/wp-content/ uploads/2024/02/junipernetworks.png" style="width: 220px; height: 147px;" />;<br />;网络设备供应商瞻博网络 (Juniper Networks) 由于最近升级了其支持门户，无意中暴露了客户产品详细信息，包括购买和保修信息。此问题由 17 年的客户发现-老实习生，已被公司整改。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#juniper-support-portal-exposed-customer-device-info" target="_blank">;[summary ]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39315875" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml :base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;废弃场所保护案例</stitle>; <id>;https://www.atlasobscura。 com/articles/column-preservation-of-abandoned-places</id>; <更新>;2024-02-09T16:57:11.179180Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.atlasobscura.com/articles /column-preservation-of-abandoned-places"/>; <author>; <name>;ecliptik</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=ecliptik</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://img.atlasobscura.com/UnFsd_8LtieECmwhhopTa7FjFzPbmUPaRS8KZz1EJUo/rt:fit/w:720/q:81/sm:1/scp:1/ar:1/aHR0cHM6Ly9hdGxh /cy1kZXYuczMuYW1h/em9uYXdzLmNvbS91/cGxvYWRzL2Fzc2V0/cy9mODM0OGZkMWNk/NzlmMjQxYTBfTGFu/c2Rvd25lIEF1ZGl0/b3JpdW0uanBn.jpg" style="宽度：220px;高度：147px;" />;<br />;文章讨论了宾夕法尼亚州历史悠久的兰斯当剧院的修复，强调了此类项目对当地社区的潜在好处。尽管存在挑战和最初的疑虑，剧院仍将作为音乐会重新开放预计到 2024 年将吸引 10 万名游客，并刺激经济增长。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#a-case-for-the-preservation-of-abandoned-places" target=" _blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39316365" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </条目>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;灯光特征</stitle>; <id>;https://en.wikipedia.org /wiki/Light_characteristic</id>; <更新>;2024-02-09T15:57:11.179658Z</更新>; <link href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Light_characteristic"/>; <作者>; <名称>;altilunium</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=altilunium</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https:// upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/6/62/Light_characteristics.svg/400px-Light_characteristics.svg.png" style="width: 220px; height: 129px;" />;<br />;本文详细介绍了航行灯的各种属性，包括其颜色、频率和图案，以帮助海员识别它们。还解释了不同类型的灯及其在灯光中使用的缩写列表和导航图表。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#light-characteristic" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator .com/item?id=39301839" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml ">; <title type="text">;对科技就业的思考</stitle>; <id>;https://ma.tt/2024/02/thoughts-on-tech-employment/</id>; <updated>;2024- 02-09T16:57:11.180121Z</更新>; <link href="https://ma.tt/2024/02/thoughts-on-tech-employment/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;luu</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=luu</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://ma.tt/wp- json/social-image-generator/v1/image/111211" style="width: 220px; height: 116px;" />;<br />;本文讨论了科技公司如何利用人工智能和其他技术来提高生产力，通常会形成更小、更高效的团队。它还探讨了全民基本收入的概念作为潜在解决方案技术进步导致失业。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#thoughts-on-tech-employment" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https ://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39309723" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat .io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;制作蓝色 LED [视频] 几乎是不可能的</stitle>; <id>;https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=AF8d72mA41M </id>; <更新>;2024-02-09T10:57:11.180618Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=AF8d72mA41M"/>; <作者>; <名称>; keepamovin</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=keepamovin</uri>; <id>;https://support.nooeec.com/hc/en-us/articles/10407982882327-Receiving-Weather-Satellite-Images-Using-SatDump</id>; <更新>;2024-02-09T07： 57:11.181566Z</更新>; <link href="https://support.nooeec.com/hc/en-us/articles/10407982882327-Receiving-Weather-Satellite-Images-Using-SatDump"/>; <作者>; <name>;belter</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=belter</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">; <a href="https:// /hackernews.betacat.io/#receiving-weather-satellite-images-using-satdump" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item? id=39299419" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <标题类型="text">;使用微服务重建 Netflix 的视频处理管道</stitle>; <id>;https://netflixtechblog.com/rebuilding-netflix-video-processing-pipeline-with-microservices-4e5e6310e359?gi=d48b3333df75</id>; <更新>;2024-02-09T09:57:11.182486Z</更新>; <link href="https://netflixtechblog.com/rebuilding-netflix-video-processing-pipeline-with-microservices-4e5e6310e359?gi=d48b3333df75" />; <author>; <name>;samaysharma</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=samaysharma</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src ="https://miro.medium.com/v2/resize:fit:1200/1*Wen2M8BgqhC7Hacc1O2Nqg.png" style="宽度：220px; height: 127px;" />;<br />;Netflix 通过微服务彻底改造了其视频处理管道，增强了系统弹性和计算效率。新平台 Cosmos 可确保流媒体和工作室操作灵活、高效的视频处理。<a href=" https://hackernews.betacat.io/#rebuilding-netflix-s-video-processing-pipeline-with-microservices" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news .ycombinator.com/item?id=39299599" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed .xml">; <title type="text">;研究人员揭示了垂直光伏系统更高的能源产量</stitle>; <id>;https://www.pv-magazine.com/2023/11/10/researchers- shed-light-on-mysterious-higher-energy-yields-in-vertical-pv-systems/</id>; <更新>;2024-02-09T13:57:11.182971Z</更新>; <link href="https: //www.pv-magazine.com/2023/11/10/researchers-shed-light-on-mysterious-higher-energy-yields-in-vertical-pv-systems/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;敷衍</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=perfunctory</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.pv -magazine.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/11/pv230038-fig1.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 164px;" />;<br />;荷兰的研究人员发现，垂直光伏系统比水平光伏系统具有更高的传热系数和更低的工作温度，从而带来意想不到的能源收益。他们还得出结论，这种效应可能会增加每年的发电量发电量提高 2-3%，特别是在辐照度条件较高的地区。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#researchers-shed-light-on-higher-energy-yields-in-vertical- pv-systems" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39314550" target="_blank">;[评论]</a >;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;有人偷了贾斯珀广播电台 200 英尺高的塔楼，业主说</stitle>; <id>;https://www.al.com/news/2024/02/someone-stole-a-jasper-radio-stations-200-foot-tower-owner-says.html</ id>; <更新>;2024-02-09T09:57:11.184418Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.al.com/news/2024/02/someone-stole-a-jasper-radio- station-200-foot-tower-owner-says.html"/>; <作者>; <名称>;HiroProtagonist</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=HiroProtagonist</uri>; < /author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.al.com/resizer/vbsk_el3kWi5A2YmSDxbC8zBy98=/1280x0/smart/cloudfront-us-east-1.images.arcpublishing.com/advancelocal /7ZVDI3VRRFELVCORKTD7T2O55U.jpg" style="宽度: 220px;高度：147px;" />;<br />;一位阿拉巴马州广播电台老板惊讶地发现他的 200 英尺高的塔和发射机被盗，导致该电台的 AM 服务无法播出。重建成本估计为六位数，总计小市场电台买不起。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#someone-stole-a-jasper-radio-stations-200-foot-tower-owner-says" target=" _blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39302045" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </条目>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;圈复杂度</stitle>; <id>;https://en.wikipedia.org /wiki/Cyclomatic_complexity</id>; <更新>;2024-02-09T09:57:11.184958Z</更新>; <link href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cyclomatic_complexity"/>; <作者>; <名称>;tosh</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=tosh</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https:// upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/2/2b/Control_flow_graph_of_function_with_loop_and_an_if_statement_without_loop_back.svg/240px-Control_flow_graph_of_function_with_loop_and_an_if_statement_without_loop_back.svg.png" style="width: 220px; height: 275px;" />;<br />;循环复杂度是由 Thomas J. McCabe, Sr. 于 1976 年开发的一种软件度量，是对程序源代码中线性独立路径数量的定量度量。测试用例确定、软件维护的关键工具，并在地理和景观生态分析中具有应用。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#cyclomatic-complexity" target="_blank">;[摘要] </a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39300629" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; height: 116px;" />;<br />;GOODY-2 的构建遵循下一代行业领先的道德原则。它非常安全，不会回答任何可能被解释的问题有争议或有问题。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#goody-2-the-world-s-most-responsible-ai-model" target="_blank">;[summary]</ a>; <id>;https://www.linkedin.com/pulse/i-dont-care-memory-safety-david-chisnall</id>; <updated>;2024 -02-09T17:57:11.186386Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.linkedin.com/pulse/i-dont-care-memory-safety-david-chisnall"/>; <作者>; < name>;kaba0</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=kaba0</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;文章强调了内存安全在编程，指出它对于构建复杂系统和减少安全漏洞至关重要。它还讨论了 CHERI 技术通过防止内存安全错误来实现更安全的编程的潜力。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#i-don-t-care-about-memory-safety-2023" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>;
